metadata.title: Artines Lash Studio | Premium Lash Extensions in Satu Mare
metadata.description: Enhance your natural beauty with expert lash extensions. Premium quality, natural results. Book your appointment in Satu Mare.

hero.title: Artines
hero.subtitle: Where precision meets artistry. Experience bespoke lash extensions crafted with care, using premium techniques for naturally stunning results.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Tailored lash artistry designed to enhance your unique beauty

classic.name: Classic Extensions
classic.description: One extension per natural lash for a naturally enhanced, elegant look. Perfect for first-timers seeking subtle sophistication.

volume.name: Volume Extensions
volume.description: Multiple lightweight extensions per lash for fuller, more dramatic results while maintaining luxurious comfort.

mega.name: Mega Volume
mega.description: Maximum fullness with ultra-fine extensions for the most dramatic, glamorous effect. Red carpet ready.

lift.name: Lash Lift & Tint
lift.description: Enhance your natural lashes with a semi-permanent curl and color boost. Effortless elegance.

refill.name: Maintenance Refill
refill.description: Maintain your perfect lashes with regular touch-ups. Keep your extensions looking impeccably fresh.

gallery.title: Portfolio
gallery.subtitle: Witness the transformation - real results from our cherished clients

about.title: About Artines
about.subtitle: Your trusted lash artist in Satu Mare

story.title: The Art of Lash Excellence
story.p1: Artines Lash Studio was born from a passion for enhancing natural beauty through meticulous artistry. Located in the heart of Satu Mare, we've cultivated a loyal clientele who appreciate our unwavering dedication to quality and precision.
story.p2: We specialize in the lash-by-lash technique - an artisan approach where each extension is individually applied to a single natural lash. This ensures a natural, comfortable fit that lasts longer and looks more authentic.

quality.title: Premium Products
quality.description: We exclusively use professional-grade products from Tabya Lashes, Romania's leading brand. This ensures the highest quality, safety, and longevity for your extensions.

technique.title: The Artines Difference
technique.description: Unlike volume techniques that can feel heavy, our classic approach provides a weightless feel while achieving beautiful, natural-looking results that enhance your unique beauty.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from those who trust us with their beauty

contact.title: Book Your Appointment
contact.subtitle: Ready to enhance your natural beauty? We'd love to hear from you
